item.description:
ENTER THE JUNGLE at the Tribal Beats LIVE Drumming Zumba Event!

Winter blues got you feeling chilly?
Well, if you've got the fever, we got the CURE!

Join us for this one of a kind Zumba/Dance/Community experience: Tribal Beats LIVE Drumming Zumba Event!

In many cultures, the drum is a symbol of life; its beat is the heartbeat of the community and it has the ability to evoke deep emotions and unite us as a community as we dance and move together in song.

Experience the thrill and hypnotic qualities for yourself and tap into your primal nature as we dance to LIVE MUSIC!

 

Our master drumming team is led by Drum Circle Facilitator Julie Corey of http://thevillagedrum.com/Home_Page.php

*OPEN TO ALL ABILITIES and THE PUBLIC*

PRICING:

PREPAID: $12 (either at one of Amy's classes or thru Paypal link here)

WALK-IN: $15/per person (Groups of 3: $25)

Please see: www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com for more details

See Event Invite on Facebook here
item.how_to_find_us: Off 495 and routes 114 and 125 (across from Panera and Burger King/next to CVS)

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: ENTER THE JUNGLE: Tribal Beats LIVE DRUMMING Zumba Event!
